headline: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Features New Corning Gorilla Glass Ceramic 2 for Enhanced Durability
summary: With Corning's leading-edge manufacturing technology, Corning Gorilla Glass Ceramic 2 offers engineered resilience on Galaxy S25 Edge, the slimmest Galaxy S series yet.Samsung Electronics and Corning...
